text: Ben and I met in law school we actually
had two classes together our first year
but we didn't know each other we never
spoke even though I you know recognized
his face so I did notice notice her and
then we went on a summer program in
Oxford England and we had a mutual
friend so she introduced us others the
first thing that I noticed about her
when we met in England was that we sat
down at a restaurant with a bunch of
other people and the first thing she did
was take a water pitcher and fill
everyone's glass like the second we sit
down it wasn't like love at first sight
or you know anything super passionate or
anything but I felt very comfortable
around him he's a super nice guy very
even-keeled we didn't actually start
dating for another month or so we were
in school together so we were seeing
each other every day and eventually we
just started dating we were out at a bar
with a bunch of our law school friends
and he had to go to a concert so I
walked him out and then it was a little
awkward and then that was like our first
kiss we really hit it off and so you
know even though we weren't living
together we're seeing each other all the
time I come from a very traditional
Catholic family so I mean we always knew
that I would move in after we got
married you could really tell that that
we were destined for for more than just
a relationship when we spent the entire
summer studying for the bar together
which was stressful but then we took a
month-long trip to Argentina and Brazil
and you know if you spend them on
through it with one person seeing them
24 hours a day you know and you can get
through it without any major fights that
was uh that was a huge step for us
yeah at this point we've been together
over four and a half years and we were
best friends he's very calm always cool
and collected always in control and
maybe I seem like that sometimes but I
think you know I tend to be a little
more dramatic i freak out a little more
I had decided you know a few months
before that I want to actually wanted to
propose it in the winter of 2010 but um
but it took me a while to get my act
together and get my finances together we
went out to a nice dinner and the
meatpacking he took me to Colicchio &
Sons and then he suggested that we take
a walk on the high line and anytime you
know a guy asks you to take a random
walk just feel like they're gonna
propose and she might have noticed that
something was up but I think I was
pretty um had kept it pretty well under
wraps I kind of had a feeling it was
gonna happen and I had arranged for a
group of friends to meet us at a bar
nearby afterwards and we were walking
along and I realized that I was running
out of space that we were approaching
the exit to the park and so I realized
that it really needs to propose soon and
then I saw this group of people massing
towards the exit and then they started
clapping and cheering and I wrongly but
at the mall at the time I thought that
it was it was our friends and they were
there waiting to congratulate us so I
panicked and he panicked and just got
down on his knees and asked me really
quickly babe would you like to marry me
or something like that I just
immediately dropped down to one knee and
proposed and her first reaction I think
she was taken aback and she just started
laughing but eventually after she got
over that she said yes and then she was
very surprised by seeing a group of our
friends at the bar nearby afterwards
none of day
